BN(O) passport holders are entitled to consular support from British missions if they live or travel outside of Hong Kong, Macao, Greater China and the United Kingdom. As well as support whilst in detention, these services can include help with lost or damaged passports, hospitalisation, being a victim of crime, accidents, repatriation and notarial work.

Operation Nifty Package was a United States Delta and Navy SEAL-operated plan conducted in 1989 designed to capture Panamanian leader Manuel Noriega.
